ratings.question_text: How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-10, if you wish
comments: All questions: Given that this isn't really a class, it was awkward to answer any of these questions. But the colloquium is a very useful experience!
I'm not sure what I'm filling on for this one. The colloquium wasn't really acourse. Although, Jim did a great job organizing it.
NA
This survey is not relevant for the Masters Colloquium.
Practice speaking about my research in front of my peers.
The student-run nature of the Colloquium.
I was very happy to present my findings at a colloquium and was glad that this course gave me the opportunity to do so.
NA
Getting the practice of presenting my work to a large, professional, knowledgeable audience.
The chanceto share my research with my peers and learn about their research too.

narratives.question_text: The things about this course most in need of improvement are:
comments: Communication about expectations throughout the semester. I wish that there had been maybe a little more structure in prepping us for the colloquium. I was never sure whether I was supposed to be doing something or not.
A little more feedback on presentations and posters would be nice.
I think a slightly more structured homework aspect would reinforce topics better.
NA
All students should be given their preference to present or do a poster. The schedule should be designed to accommodate everyone who wants to do a presentation.

narratives.question_text: What was the availability and quality of help you received of the instructor and TA?
comments: NA

narratives.question_text: Discuss if you wish how this course fits into your overall program.
comments: it was required as part of the MESc
NA
It's an important tradition and component of the MESc program. It should certainly continue.
This was the perfect preparation for scientific conferences.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: It was required for graduation.
It was required. Also, it was provided great presentation experience for me. Finally, it was wonderful to see all my classmates present.
It was required
I wanted to gain an understanding of spatial statistics and I feel that I now have a solid overview of certain aspects.
NA
Because it is required.
It was required.

narratives.question_text: Did it live up to your expectations?
comments: It was neat to present in front of my friends but I am disappointed that since I did not go to the reception afterwards, I never heard about the results of the judging. I assumed an email announcement would be sent out after. It was a bit of an anticlimactic end to all that hard work.
Yes; I thought it went very well.
It very much lived up to my expectations.
yes
Yes

narratives.question_text: Did you get out of it what you expected?
comments: Yes, very much.
Yes
Yes

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: It helped with more abstract topics to have multiple people working on it at the same time.

narratives.question_text: For students taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Start earlier than you think you should.
PRACTICE!
Enjoy it!
